title: My Vietnam
lyrics: Once I fed the homeless I'll never forget the look upon their faces as I Treated them with respect This is my vietnam I'm at war Life keeps on dropping bombs and I keep score Never liked school that much They tried to teach me better but I just wasnt hearin it because I thought I was already pretty clever   What do you exspect from me what am I not giving you What could I do for you to make me okay in your eyes
